experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed and maintained full-stack web applications using Python and React. Led migration of legacy systems to microservices architecture. Improved API response times by 40% through optimization.
highlights: Led team of 3 engineers on key project
Reduced deployment time by 60% with CI/CD improvements

experience.title: Junior Developer

projects.name: Open Source Contribution
projects.description: Contributed to popular open-source project with 10K+ stars

common_answers.why_leaving: I'm looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow in a dynamic environment.
common_answers.greatest_strength: My ability to quickly learn new technologies and apply them to solve complex problems.
common_answers.greatest_weakness: I sometimes spend too much time perfecting code, but I've learned to balance quality with delivery timelines.
common_answers.where_see_yourself_5_years: I see myself as a senior engineer leading technical initiatives and mentoring junior developers.
common_answers.why_this_company: I'm impressed by {company}'s innovative approach to {industry} and would love to contribute to impactful projects.
common_answers.salary_expectations: Based on my experience and the role requirements, I'm looking for a salary in the range of $100,000-$150,000, but I'm open to discussing compensation that reflects the full value of the opportunity.
